VcBlade.name: VcBlade
VcBlade.description: Blade container component that implements the blade pattern for UI organization. Blades are panels that slide in from the right side of the screen.

prop-width.name: width
prop-width.description: Width of the blade (can be in pixels or percentage)

prop-expanded.name: expanded
prop-expanded.description: Whether the blade is expanded to full width. If not provided, defaults to `false`.

prop-closable.name: closable
prop-closable.description: Whether the blade can be closed by the user

prop-toolbarItems.name: toolbarItems
prop-toolbarItems.description: Array of toolbar items to display

prop-modified.name: modified
prop-modified.description: Indicates whether there are unsaved changes in the blade content. Defaults to `undefined`.

slot-default.name: default
slot-default.description: The main content of the blade

slot-backButton.name: backButton
slot-backButton.description: Custom back button for mobile view

slot-widgets.name: widgets
slot-widgets.description: **Deprecated**. Use `useWidgets()` composable instead. Slot for blade widgets.

props.title: string - Title displayed in the blade header
props.subtitle: string - Subtitle displayed in the blade header
props.icon: string - Icon displayed in the blade header
props.width: number | string - Width of the blade (default: 30%)
props.expanded: boolean - Whether the blade is expanded to full width
props.closable: boolean - Whether the blade can be closed by the user
props.toolbarItems: IBladeToolbar[] - Array of toolbar items to display

VcTable.name: VcTable
VcTable.description: Highly customizable data table component with sorting, pagination, filtering, and multi-select support

prop-columns.name: columns
prop-columns.description: Array of column definitions for the table

prop-items.name: items
prop-items.description: Array of data items to display in the table

prop-expanded.name: expanded
prop-expanded.description: Controls whether the table is in expanded view

prop-totalCount.name: totalCount
prop-totalCount.description: Total count of items (used for pagination)

prop-header.name: header
prop-header.description: Controls visibility of the table header

prop-footer.name: footer
prop-footer.description: Controls visibility of the table footer

feature-row-actions.name: Row Actions
feature-row-actions.description: Contextual actions for each table row
feature-row-actions.codeExample:
<template>
  <VcTable
    :columns="columns"
    :items="products"
    multiselect
    select-all
    :item-action-builder="actionBuilder"
    enable-item-actions
    state-key="products-table"
    @selection-changed="onSelectionChanged"
  >
    <template #item_status="{ item }">
      <VcBadge :variant="item.isActive ? 'success' : 'danger'">
        {{ item.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' }}
      </VcBadge>
    </template>
  </VcTable>
</template>

<script lang="ts" setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { VcTable, VcBadge, ITableColumns, IActionBuilderResult } from '@vc-shell/framework';

const columns = ref<ITableColumns[]>([
  { id: 'name', title: 'Product Name', sortable: true, alwaysVisible: true },
  { id: 'sku', title: 'SKU', sortable: true, width: 120 },
  { id: 'price', title: 'Price', sortable: true, width: 100, type: 'money' },
  { id: 'status', title: 'Status', sortable: true, width: 120 }
]);

const products = ref([
  { id: '1', name: 'Product A', sku: 'SKU001', price: 29.99, isActive: true },
  { id: '2', name: 'Product B', sku: 'SKU002', price: 49.99, isActive: true },
  { id: '3', name: 'Product C', sku: 'SKU003', price: 19.99, isActive: false }
]);

const selectedProducts = ref([]);

function actionBuilder(item) {
  return [
    {
      title: 'Edit',
      icon: 'material-edit',
      clickHandler: () => editProduct(item)
    },
    {
      title: 'Delete',
      icon: 'material-delete',
      type: 'danger',
      clickHandler: () => deleteProduct(item)
    }
  ];
}

function onSelectionChanged(items) {
  selectedProducts.value = items;
}

function editProduct(product) {
  // Edit logic
}

function deleteProduct(product) {
  // Delete logic
}
</script>

feature-multiselect.name: Multiselect
feature-multiselect.codeExample:
<template>
  <VcTable
    :columns="columns"
    :items="products"
    multiselect
    select-all
    :item-action-builder="actionBuilder"
    enable-item-actions
    state-key="products-table"
    @selection-changed="onSelectionChanged"
  >
    <template #item_status="{ item }">
      <VcBadge :variant="item.isActive ? 'success' : 'danger'">
        {{ item.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' }}
      </VcBadge>
    </template>
  </VcTable>
</template>

<script lang="ts" setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { VcTable, VcBadge, ITableColumns, IActionBuilderResult } from '@vc-shell/framework';

const columns = ref<ITableColumns[]>([
  { id: 'name', title: 'Product Name', sortable: true, alwaysVisible: true },
  { id: 'sku', title: 'SKU', sortable: true, width: 120 },
  { id: 'price', title: 'Price', sortable: true, width: 100, type: 'money' },
  { id: 'status', title: 'Status', sortable: true, width: 120 }
]);

const products = ref([
  { id: '1', name: 'Product A', sku: 'SKU001', price: 29.99, isActive: true },
  { id: '2', name: 'Product B', sku: 'SKU002', price: 49.99, isActive: true },
  { id: '3', name: 'Product C', sku: 'SKU003', price: 19.99, isActive: false }
]);

const selectedProducts = ref([]);

function actionBuilder(item) {
  return [
    {
      title: 'Edit',
      icon: 'material-edit',
      clickHandler: () => editProduct(item)
    },
    {
      title: 'Delete',
      icon: 'material-delete',
      type: 'danger',
      clickHandler: () => deleteProduct(item)
    }
  ];
}

function onSelectionChanged(items) {
  selectedProducts.value = items;
}

function editProduct(product) {
  // Edit logic
}

function deleteProduct(product) {
  // Delete logic
}
</script>

feature-filters.name: Advanced Filters
feature-filters.description: Custom filter panel with staged/applied pattern

props.items: T[] - Array of data items to display
props.stateKey: string - Unique key for persisting table state
props.empty: { icon?: string, text: string | ComputedRef<string>, action?: string, clickHandler?: () => void } - Empty state configuration
props.notfound: { icon?: string, text: string | ComputedRef<string>, action?: string, clickHandler?: () => void } - Not found state configuration

slots.mobile-item: Custom mobile view for each item

events.item-click: (item: T) => void - Emitted when row is clicked
events.header-click: (column: ITableColumns) => void - Emitted when column header is clicked
events.pagination-click: (page: number) => void - Emitted when pagination is clicked
events.search:change: (value: string) => void - Emitted when search value changes
events.selection-changed: (items: T[]) => void - Emitted when selection changes

examples.title: Table with Empty and Not Found States

VcField.name: VcField
VcField.description: IMPORTANT: VcField is for DISPLAYING read-only data with label-value pairs. It is NOT a wrapper for form inputs! For forms, use Field from vee-validate.

prop-modelValue.name: modelValue
prop-modelValue.description: Content to display in the field

prop-copyable.name: copyable
prop-copyable.description: Whether to show a copy button

prop-aspectRatio.name: aspectRatio
prop-aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio for label and content columns

props.label: string - Field label text
props.modelValue: string | number - Field value (for read-only display)
props.aspectRatio: [number, number] - Label to value width ratio for horizontal layout
props.copyable: boolean - Show copy button for read-only fields

VcInput.name: VcInput
VcInput.description: Text input field component with validation support, including date inputs and debounced search

prop-clearable.name: clearable
prop-clearable.description: Whether to show a clear button when input has a value

prop-name.name: name
prop-name.description: Name attribute for the input element

prop-loading.name: loading
prop-loading.description: Shows a loading spinner inside the input

prop-autofocus.name: autofocus
prop-autofocus.description: Automatically focuses the input on render

prop-error.name: error
prop-error.description: Indicates an error state for the input

prop-maxlength.name: maxlength
prop-maxlength.description: Maximum character length for the input

prop-required.name: required
prop-required.description: Adds a required indicator to the label

prop-multilanguage.name: multilanguage
prop-multilanguage.description: Indicates if the field supports multiple languages

props.type: string - Input type (text, email, url, number, date, password)
props.label: string - Input label

events.update:modelValue: (value: string | number) => void - Emitted when value changes

examples.title: Text Input with Validation (vee-validate)
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage, handleChange, errors }"
  :label="$t('OFFER_DETAILS.FIELDS.SKU.TITLE')"
  :model-value="offer.sku"
  rules="required|min:3"
  name="sku"
>
  <VcInput
    v-model="offer.sku"
    :label="$t('OFFER_DETAILS.FIELDS.SKU.TITLE')"
    :placeholder="$t('OFFER_DETAILS.FIELDS.SKU.PLACEHOLDER')"
    required
    maxlength="61"
    :loading="isSkuValidating"
    clearable
    :error="!!errors.length"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
    @update:model-value="handleChange"
  ></VcInput>
</Field>

prop-placeholder.name: placeholder
prop-placeholder.description: Placeholder text when textarea is empty

prop-error.name: error
prop-error.description: Whether to show the textarea in error state

prop-errorMessage.name: errorMessage
prop-errorMessage.description: Error message to display below the textarea

prop-name.name: name
prop-name.description: Name attribute for the textarea element

prop-multilanguage.name: multilanguage
prop-multilanguage.description: Whether the label should show multilanguage icon

prop-currentLanguage.name: currentLanguage
prop-currentLanguage.description: Current language code for multilanguage support

slot-error.name: error
slot-error.description: Custom content for error message display

events.update:modelValue: (value: string) => void - Emitted when value changes

VcSelect.name: VcSelect
VcSelect.description: Dropdown select component with search support, async options loading, and custom templates

prop-options.name: options
prop-options.description: Options array or async function returning options

prop-optionValue.name: optionValue
prop-optionValue.description: Property name or function to get option value

prop-optionLabel.name: optionLabel
prop-optionLabel.description: Property name or function to get option label

prop-placeholder.name: placeholder
prop-placeholder.description: Placeholder text when no value is selected

prop-debounce.name: debounce
prop-debounce.description: Debounce time for search input (in milliseconds)

prop-clearable.name: clearable
prop-clearable.description: Whether the value can be cleared

prop-emitValue.name: emitValue
prop-emitValue.description: Emit only the value instead of the entire option

prop-required.name: required
prop-required.description: Mark the select as required (shows asterisk)

prop-error.name: error
prop-error.description: Show the select in error state

prop-errorMessage.name: errorMessage
prop-errorMessage.description: Error message to display below the select

prop-hint.name: hint
prop-hint.description: Hint text to display below the select

prop-tooltip.name: tooltip
prop-tooltip.description: Tooltip text to display next to the label

prop-prefix.name: prefix
prop-prefix.description: Prefix text inside the select field

prop-suffix.name: suffix
prop-suffix.description: Suffix text inside the select field

prop-mapOptions.name: mapOptions
prop-mapOptions.description: Map labels of model from options array

prop-outline.name: outline
prop-outline.description: Whether to show an outline around the select

prop-multilanguage.name: multilanguage
prop-multilanguage.description: Whether the label should show multilanguage icon

prop-currentLanguage.name: currentLanguage
prop-currentLanguage.description: Current language code for multilanguage support

props.options: Array | Function - Select options array or async function that returns options
props.optionValue: string - Property name to use as option value
props.optionLabel: string - Property name to use as option label
props.label: string - Select label

slots.selected-item: Custom template for selected item display

events.update:modelValue: (value: any) => void - Emitted when value changes

examples.title: Searchable Select with Async Options
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage, handleChange, errors }"
  :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT.TITLE')"
  :model-value="offer.productId"
  name="product"
  rules="required"
>
  <VcSelect
    v-model="offer.productId"
    :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT.TITLE')"
    required
    searchable
    :loading="fetchProductsLoading"
    :placeholder="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT.PLACEHOLDER')"
    :options="fetchProducts"
    option-value="id"
    option-label="name"
    :disabled="!!offer.id"
    :error="!!errors.length"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
    :clearable="false"
    @update:model-value="handleChange"
  >
    <template #selected-item="{ opt }">
      <OfferProductsSelectCategoryTemplate
        :opt="opt"
        slot-name="selected-item"
      />
    </template>
    <template #option="{ opt }">
      <OfferProductsSelectCategoryTemplate
        :opt="opt"
        slot-name="option"
      />
    </template>
  </VcSelect>
</Field>

examples.title: Simple Select with Static Options
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage, handleChange, errors }"
  rules="required"
  :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.TITLE')"
  :model-value="offer.productType"
  name="productType"
>
  <VcSelect
    v-model="offer.productType"
    :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.TITLE')"
    required
    :placeholder="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.PLACEHOLDER')"
    :disabled="!!offer.id"
    :error="!!errors.length"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
    :options="productTypeOptions"
    :tooltip="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.TOOLTIP')"
    option-value="value"
    option-label="label"
    @update:model-value="handleChange"
  ></VcSelect>
</Field>

prop-name.name: name
prop-name.description: Name attribute for the input element

prop-errorMessage.name: errorMessage
prop-errorMessage.description: Error message to display below the checkbox

prop-tooltip.name: tooltip
prop-tooltip.description: Tooltip text displayed with the label

prop-indeterminate.name: indeterminate
prop-indeterminate.description: Whether to show the checkbox in indeterminate state

slot-default.name: default
slot-default.description: Content displayed next to the checkbox

slot-error.name: error
slot-error.description: Custom content for error message display

events.update:modelValue: (value: boolean) => void - Emitted when checked state changes

prop-trueValue.name: trueValue
prop-trueValue.description: Value when switch is in the on state

prop-falseValue.name: falseValue
prop-falseValue.description: Value when switch is in the off state

events.update:modelValue: (value: boolean) => void - Emitted when state changes

VcForm.name: VcForm
VcForm.description: Form container component, use with vee-validate Field for validation

examples.title: Basic Form
examples.code:
<VcForm>
  <Field v-slot="{ field, errors }" name="name" rules="required">
    <VcInput v-bind="field" :error="!!errors.length" />
  </Field>
</VcForm>

VcCard.name: VcCard
VcCard.description: Card container for grouping related form fields and content into visually distinct sections. IMPORTANT: Default slot has NO padding - always add tw-p-4 for forms or tw-p-2 for galleries.

props.icon: string - Material icon name displayed in header
props.fill: boolean - Card content fills available space

slots.default: Main card content (NO padding by default - add tw-p-4)

events.header:click: () => void - Emitted when header is clicked
events.state:collapsed: (collapsed: boolean) => void - Emitted when collapse state changes

examples.title: Basic Card with Form Fields

VcButton.name: VcButton
VcButton.description: Button component with variants and states, commonly used in filter controls

prop-selected.name: selected
prop-selected.description: Whether the button is in a selected state

prop-text.name: text
prop-text.description: Whether the button should be rendered as text without borders

slot-default.name: default
slot-default.description: Content to display inside the button

props.variant: string - Button variant (primary, secondary, danger, etc.)

events.click: () => void - Emitted when button is clicked

prop-shadow.name: shadow
prop-shadow.description: Whether to show shadows when content is scrollable

prop-noPadding.name: noPadding
prop-noPadding.description: Removes default padding from the container

VcBadge.name: VcBadge
VcBadge.description: Display notification badges and status indicators with count or dot variants

prop-isDot.name: isDot
prop-isDot.description: Whether to display the badge as a dot without text

prop-active.name: active
prop-active.description: Whether the badge is in an active state

prop-customPosition.name: customPosition
prop-customPosition.description: Whether to use custom positioning for the badge

props.content: string | number - Content to display inside the badge
props.isDot: boolean - Display as dot without text

slots.default: Content that badge will be attached to

events.click: Emitted when clickable badge is clicked

VcBanner.name: VcBanner
VcBanner.description: Display informational messages, warnings, or alerts at the top of content areas

props.closable: boolean - Whether banner can be dismissed

examples.title: Info Banner
examples.code:
<VcBanner variant="info">
  New features are now available!
</VcBanner>

examples.title: Warning Banner
examples.code:
<VcBanner variant="warning" :closable="true">
  Your subscription will expire in 3 days
</VcBanner>

VcHint.name: VcHint
VcHint.description: Display supplementary information or guidance text with subtle styling

slot-default.name: default
slot-default.description: Content to display inside the hint

examples.title: File Upload Hint
examples.code: <VcHint>Maximum file size: 5MB. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF</VcHint>

VcLabel.name: VcLabel
VcLabel.description: Form field label with required indicator, tooltip, and multilanguage support

prop-tooltipIcon.name: tooltipIcon
prop-tooltipIcon.description: Icon to use for the tooltip

prop-multilanguage.name: multilanguage
prop-multilanguage.description: Shows language indicator for multilanguage fields

prop-error.name: error
prop-error.description: Shows the label in error state

props.error: boolean - Shows label in error state

examples.title: Label with Tooltip
examples.code:
<VcLabel>
  Password
  <template #tooltip>
    Password must be at least 8 characters
  </template>
</VcLabel>

VcStatusIcon.name: VcStatusIcon
VcStatusIcon.description: Simple status indicator using icons for success/error states

props.status: boolean - Whether to show success (true) or error (false) status

VcTooltip.name: VcTooltip
VcTooltip.description: Tooltip component for displaying additional information on hover

props.offset: { crossAxis?: number, mainAxis?: number } - Offset from trigger element

examples.title: Basic Tooltip
examples.code:
<VcTooltip>
  <VcButton>Hover me</VcButton>
  <template #tooltip>
    This is a helpful tooltip
  </template>
</VcTooltip>

VcVideo.name: VcVideo
VcVideo.description: Video embed component with label and tooltip support

prop-tooltip.name: tooltip
prop-tooltip.description: Additional information shown in a tooltip

prop-source.name: source
prop-source.description: URL of the video to be embedded

examples.title: Video with Tooltip
examples.code:
<VcVideo
  label="Tutorial"
  tooltip="Watch this video to learn more"
  source="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PeXX-V-dwpA"
/>

VcWidget.name: VcWidget
VcWidget.description: Base widget component for details blades. Displays clickable cards with icon, title, and badge value. Used as foundation for all custom widgets.

prop-icon.name: icon
prop-icon.description: Icon to display in the widget

prop-title.name: title
prop-title.description: Title text displayed below the icon

prop-value.name: value
prop-value.description: Value to display as a badge count (truncated at 99+)

prop-horizontal.name: horizontal
prop-horizontal.description: Whether to arrange the widget horizontally

props.title: string - Widget title text
props.value: string | number - Badge value (count, status, etc.)

events.click: () => void - Emitted when widget is clicked (if not disabled)

VcBreadcrumbs.name: VcBreadcrumbs
VcBreadcrumbs.description: Adaptive navigation breadcrumbs with overflow handling and click handlers

prop-items.name: items
prop-items.description: Array of breadcrumb items to display

prop-separated.name: separated
prop-separated.description: Whether to show separators between items

props.items: Breadcrumbs[] - Array of breadcrumb items with { id, title, icon, clickHandler }

slots.trigger: { click: () => void, isActive: boolean } - Custom dropdown trigger

examples.title: Basic Breadcrumbs
examples.code:
<VcBreadcrumbs :items="[
  { id: 'home', title: 'Home', icon: 'material-home' },
  { id: 'products', title: 'Products' },
  { id: 'electronics', title: 'Electronics' }
]" />

examples.title: With Click Handlers
examples.code:
<VcBreadcrumbs :items="[
  { id: 'home', title: 'Home', clickHandler: () => navigateTo('/') },
  { id: 'products', title: 'Products', clickHandler: () => navigateTo('/products') },
  { id: 'current', title: 'Current Page' }
]" />

VcInputCurrency.name: VcInputCurrency
VcInputCurrency.description: Specialized input for monetary values with currency selection and formatting

events.change: (value: number | string | null) => void - Input changed

examples.title: Currency with Validation
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage }"
  :model-value="amount"
  name="amount"

>
  <VcInputCurrency
    v-model:model-value="amount"
    v-model:option="currency"
    label="Amount"
    :options="currencies"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
  />
</Field>

VcInputDropdown.name: VcInputDropdown
VcInputDropdown.description: Combined input and dropdown for value entry with unit/category selection

props.modelValue: string | number | Date | null - Input value

props.optionLabel: string | ((option: unknown) => string) - Option label property
props.label: string - Field label
props.name: string - Field name

examples.title: Measurement Input

<VcInputDropdown
  v-model="value"

  :options="['mm', 'cm', 'm', 'km']"

/>

prop-placeholder.name: placeholder

prop-multilanguage.description: Enable multilanguage support for the label

prop-currentLanguage.description: Current language code for multilanguage support

VcIcon.name: VcIcon
VcIcon.description: Universal icon component supporting Material, Bootstrap, Lucide, Font Awesome and custom SVG icons

prop-icon.name: icon
prop-icon.description: The icon to display (string identifier or component)

prop-useContainer.name: useContainer
prop-useContainer.description: Whether to wrap the icon in a container for consistent spacing

prop-basePath.name: basePath
prop-basePath.description: Base path for SVG icons (only for SVG icons)

props.useContainer: boolean - Wrap icon in container (default: true)
props.customSize: number - Custom size in pixels (overrides size prop)
props.basePath: string - Base path for SVG icons (default: '/assets/icons')

VcImage.name: VcImage
VcImage.description: Image display component with aspect ratio control, sizing, and placeholder support

prop-aspect.name: aspect
prop-aspect.description: The aspect ratio of the image container

prop-rounded.name: rounded
prop-rounded.description: Whether to display the image with rounded corners

prop-bordered.name: bordered
prop-bordered.description: Whether to display a border around the image

prop-clickable.name: clickable
prop-clickable.description: Whether the image can be clicked, emitting a click event

prop-emptyIcon.name: emptyIcon
prop-emptyIcon.description: The icon to display when no src is provided

events.click: Emitted when clickable image is clicked

VcStatus.name: VcStatus
VcStatus.description: Status indicator component with color variants and dot mode for displaying item states

prop-variant.name: variant
prop-variant.description: Visual style of the status indicator

prop-outline.name: outline
prop-outline.description: **DEPRECATED**: Whether to show only the outline

prop-extend.name: extend
prop-extend.description: Whether to use an extended layout with more padding & square corners

prop-dot.name: dot
prop-dot.description: Whether to display only a colored dot without text

slot-default.name: default
slot-default.description: Content of the status indicator (text or complex content)

props.extend: boolean - Use extended layout with more padding
props.dot: boolean - Display only colored dot without text

VcLink.name: VcLink
VcLink.description: Clickable link component with active and disabled states

prop-active.name: active
prop-active.description: Sets the link to active state

prop-disabled.name: disabled
prop-disabled.description: Disables the link, making it not clickable

events.click: Emitted when link is clicked (if not disabled)

VcEditor.name: VcEditor
VcEditor.description: Rich Markdown editor with image upload, preview, source view, and split mode

prop-placeholder.name: placeholder
prop-placeholder.description: Placeholder text when editor is empty

prop-tooltip.name: tooltip
prop-tooltip.description: Tooltip text for the editor label

prop-multilanguage.name: multilanguage
prop-multilanguage.description: Whether the editor supports multiple languages

slot-error.name: error
slot-error.description: Custom content for error message display

props.label: string - Field label
props.assetsFolder: string - Folder path for uploaded assets (REQUIRED)

examples.title: Editor with Validation
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage }"
  :model-value="item.description"
  name="description"
  rules="required"
>
  <VcEditor
    v-model="item.description"
    label="Description"
    assetsFolder="items"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
    required
  />
</Field>

VcFileUpload.name: VcFileUpload
VcFileUpload.description: File upload component with drag-and-drop support and validation

props.name: string - Input field name (default: 'Gallery')
props.customText: { dragHere: string, browse: string } - Custom text labels

events.upload: (files: FileList) => void - Emitted when files are ready to upload

VcRating.name: VcRating
VcRating.description: Rating display component with stars, text, or combined variants

prop-placeholder.name: placeholder
prop-placeholder.description: Placeholder text when no rating is available

examples.title: Rating in Table

VcSlider.name: VcSlider
VcSlider.description: Carousel/slider component for displaying content in horizontal scrollable container

prop-slides.name: slides
prop-slides.description: Array of objects representing slides to display

prop-navigation.name: navigation
prop-navigation.description: Enables/disables navigation buttons for the slider

prop-overflow.name: overflow
prop-overflow.description: Allows slides to be visible outside the container

props.slides: Record<string, unknown>[] | unknown[] - Array of slide data
props.overflow: boolean - Allow slides visible outside container
props.spaceBetweenSlides: number - Space between slides in pixels (default: 10)

slots.default: { slide: Object } - Content for each slide

VcGallery.name: VcGallery
VcGallery.description: Image gallery component with upload, preview, edit, delete, and drag-to-reorder functionality

prop-images.name: images
prop-images.description: Array of images to display in the gallery

prop-disabled.name: disabled
prop-disabled.description: Disables all interactions with the gallery

prop-required.name: required
prop-required.description: Indicates if the field is required

prop-multiple.name: multiple
prop-multiple.description: Allows multiple file selection during upload

prop-itemActions.name: itemActions
prop-itemActions.description: Controls which actions are available for each image

prop-hideAfterUpload.name: hideAfterUpload
prop-hideAfterUpload.description: Hides the upload button after files are uploaded

prop-name.name: name
prop-name.description: Name of the gallery (used for identification)

props.label: string - Field label
props.itemActions: { preview: boolean, edit: boolean, remove: boolean } - Available actions per image
props.hideAfterUpload: boolean - Hide upload button after files uploaded
props.name: string - Gallery name (default: 'Gallery')
props.customText: { dragHere: string, browse: string } - Custom upload text

events.upload: (files: FileList, startingSortOrder?: number) => void - Emitted when files selected
events.sort: (sorted: ICommonAsset[]) => void - Emitted when images reordered
events.edit: (image: ICommonAsset) => void - Emitted when edit action triggered
events.remove: (image: ICommonAsset) => void - Emitted when remove action triggered

_slotComponents.name: _slotComponents
_slotComponents.description: Example slot component from real vendor-portal projects. Create custom slot components as needed for your specific entity.
